tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landfill_capacity (
  landfill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_name VARCHAR(50),
  capacity_in_tons FLOAT,
  waste_type TEXT,
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_capacity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    landfill_name TEXT,
    capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_capacity (
  landfill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_name VARCHAR(50),
  capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_statistics (
  disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_location (
  landfill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id),
  date TIMESTAMP,
  amount_collected DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_statistics (
  statistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id),
  date TIMESTAMP,
  waste_category INT REFERENCES waste_categories(category_id),
  amount_collected DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE decision_making_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  action_taken TEXT,
  user_id INT
)
